page.title: 14PEOPLE
page.content: There is little employment in {Higham-on-the-Hill.}People who work travel to Nuneaton,Hinckley and Coventry-a car being essential owing to the poor bus service.Some mothers with small children work at home as {outworkers}for Hinckley hosiery and knitwear factories.There are two {registered child minders.A home help {service}is available for anyone in need,also a{'Meals on Wheels'}service visits the area. People needing Hospital treatment attend local Hospitals.A{Doctor's {surgery}is available but no{Dentist. A{builder}employs 12 people-only 3 from village.Few of the villagers work at local firms. Inhabitants not fashion conscious- Teenagers wear jeans and sweaters. Meals out are eaten in nearby towns or at the Restaurant of a local Pub..
